transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Hi, good morning, ma'am.
Customer: Hi.
Executive: Good morning, sir. Actually, sir, mujhe ye main aapka abhi maine ye dekha tha relieving letter to usme abhi aapne date wagera mention nahi kiya hai. Ek aisa format bheja hai, right?
Customer: Ji, isi liye main wahi aapko aapse puchna chah raha tha ki isme kya aur kaha mention kya kya karna hai. Ye maine roughly bheja tha aapko. Hai to ye accurate, bas isme mujhe naam company jo bhi aapke yaha hai wo main mention kar dunga.
Executive: Ha ha, wo cheez to aapka theek hai. Matlab aap apni company ke regarding maine jo pura padha tha aapka to ye roughly aisa tha.
Executive: Ek normal aap na isko final karke isme jo date aapka starting me tha na ki from this date to date this date matlab kitne year unhone kaam kiya tha aapke sath jo aapne column blank chhod rakha hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To ek baar waha pe aap date aap mention kariye aur year aap mention kariye. Theek hai? Aisa proper ye fir aapka ready ho jayega. Aap fir forward kijiye. Okay? As a final wala. Sir, kyunki isme abhi hum bhi edit kar sakte hai. Shayad aapne word me bheja hai, right?
Customer: Bilkul bilkul. To ye cheez ek kaam kare aapko jo jo mention karna hai aap kar dijiye, main aapko bata deta hu.
Executive: Actually, sir, ye aap finalize karke apne end se ek baar share kare, sir. Wo jyada better rahega. Kyunki agar hum bhi bhejenge to final wo nahi hoga na. To ek baar aap apne end se final kyunki word abhi hum bhi update kar sakte hai. Aisa bhejiye. PDF aisa aap normal bhejiye jisme update wagera hum na kar paaye. Hai na? Sir, normal aap kyunki ye bhi word abhi isme hum koi bhi click idhar udhar kar sakta hai. To ye hoga nahi completely. To ek baar aap mujhe ye cheez pehle final karke share kare. Uske baad jo aapka ticket dekh rahe hai na to ek baar main unse confirm kar deti hu. Aap mujhe ek baar share karenge then main unko ek baar ye forward karungi. To fir uske baad main unko call pe baat karungi ki ye enough hai ya kuch aur chahiye aapko document. Fir main unse finalize karungi. Usse maine kabhi unse pehle baat hi nahi ki hai. Mujhe ek baar pehle hi hum bhejte hai unko ki pehle se unhone yahi manga tha humse. Hai na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To ek baar aap ye kab tak mujhe share karenge aap bataiye.
Customer: Ye to main aapko abhi 10 minute me share kar dunga.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Ji sir. Aur sir ye main puchna chah rahi thi ki aapne jo mujhe parso connect kiya tha wo matlab call kiske number pe gaya tha? Mere number pe aapne call kiya tha ya customer care ke number pe call kiya tha sir?
Customer: Wo maine aapke personal number pe call kiya tha jispe main WhatsApp aapke sath.
Executive: Personal wala hai na? Ha, to WhatsApp pe aapki call aayi hui thi is number se to isiliye maine ispe call kiya.
Customer: Ha ha ha, no issue. Actually sir kya hai na anaf se ja rahi hai aapke paas is number pe call kyunki na aisa aapke paas us din jo aapne call kiya tha mera missed ho gaya tha na call. Uske maine do minute baad aapko call back kar liya tha to otherwise uske liye na hamare paas ek ticket open ho gayi hai sir. Jisme ki aapko call missed ho gaya hai isme aapko connect karna tha. To abhi isliye jab main call kar rahi hu to mere office matlab is number pe ja raha hai call. To no issue sir main abhi aapka ticket close kar rahi hu apne end se. Aur koi concern aapka aur koi pareshani kuch aapko buyleads wagera ya kuch aur bhi concern hai aapka?
Customer: Nahi, abhi to sirf pehle yahi ho jaye kaam, vikas to uske baad hi hogi. Ha, ek baar ye wali cheez final ho jaye. Mujhe aap ek baar dekhiye ye bataiye jo maine aapko jo letter bheja hai. Theek hai. Usme jo sabse pehle likha hua hai you worked at Assured Enterprise company from yaha par hamari company ka naam dalega.
Executive: Ha ha ha ha, bilkul.
Customer: Assured Enterprises.
Executive: Hmm. Theek hai. Aur main bhi open ek baar main bhi open kar leti hu. Ha, ye wala hai na you worked at Shaurya Enterprises from date to date jaise bhi hai for one year, six months jo bhi aapka hai. Hai na? Wo yaha pe. Ye jo sabse pehle wali jo kya kehte hai black blank line hai main ye wali puch raha hu aapko. Jisme likha hua hai Assured Enterprise company from is from ke baad jo blank hai usme kya dalna hai?
Executive: Date date sir, date hota hai.
Customer: Ye wo date hogi jisme unhone join kiya. Aur jaha se start kiya hai joining date to end date aur for fir uske baad two years, one year jitne bhi year unhone kaam kiya six months aap kaam kiya hai to year fir cross karke month mention kariye. Itne time unhone kiya tha. Theek hai. Fir uske baad 24 to ye jo two ke baad jo unhone chhod diya tha. Ha ha. First and ha fir first and to cessation of employment with the company from aapka jo bhi company ka naam hai yahi pe aayega. Actually sir jaise aapke jo bante hai jaise aapke relieving letter banta hai unke paas relieving letter agar aapke yaha nahi banta to ek baar aapko jaise bhi apne end se hai na wo ek baar isme bas aapke company ka naam aur date to date aayega. Then aapka aur sab kuch theek hai isme. Ha, aur sab kuch. Yahi hai upar company ka naam ho jayega fir kaun se date ko join kiya tha usse leke kab tak unhone kaam kiya ye. Ha ha. Aur jo year se year se pehle ka jo blank hai waha par ye year aayega kitna year unhone kaam kiya ek saal. Hmm hmm. To ek baar aap mujhe ha ek baar aap mujhe final karke ek baar share kariye then main usko na unko ek baar check karwa ke then finalize karwaungi sir wo ek baar check karenge wo bhi ek baar ek baar apne end se wo bhi review karenge na is cheez ka ki sahi hai nahi hai finalize karte hai nahi karte hai. Hai na? Aur baki main abhi abhi abhi jo aapka na ticket open hua tha hamare paas to wo main ticket close kar rahi hu sir to uske behalf pe na ek aapko mail jayega confirmation ke liye to ek baar usme na yes kar dijiyega please wo kyunki mere liye jo bhi main interaction aapse kar rahi hu coordinate kar rahi hu wo aap usse satisfied hai ya nahi. To please usme yes aap kar dijiyega sir. Theek hai? Ha ha jo bhi aapka mail hai na usi pe hi aayega same. Theek hai main close kar rahi hu apne end se. Okay? Okay okay okay thank you so much. Baki aap fir aap WhatsApp wale number pe hamesha coordinate kara kariyega. Theek hai? Bilkul bilkul main aapko usi pe call karunga usi pe message kar dunga. Okay okay thank you so much. Theek hai ma'am thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs assistance with relieving letter format.

- Wants to know which number called him earlier.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the required details to be filled.

- Executive confirmed the call was made to personal number.

- Executive closed the ticket and sent confirmation mail.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share the finalized letter in 10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- relieving letter, date, company name, ticket
